categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Razor Leader was a male pilot for the Thaereian military during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Razor Leader flew a Z-95 Headhunter and commanded a number of others. During the Clone Wars, he was sent to the Cularin system and assigned to protect the Luxury, a luxurious liner which was being used for a peace conference.

Using the alias "Lernia", the Dark Jedi Raik Muun informed Razor Leader that someone was going to board The Luxury and sabotage the conference. When the Heroes of Cularin tried to land their ship on the liner, Razor Leader initially tried to prevent them from doing so, although they eventually persuaded him to let them land.
